00040 // Squared Distance of d-dimensional point
00042 template< typename Point, unsigned I > class Distance
00043 {
00044 public:
00045    static inline double eval( const Point &p, 
00046                               const Point &q )
00047    {
00048      double sum = ( (double) p[I] - (double) q[I] );
00049      sum = sum * sum;
00050      return sum + Distance<Point, I-1 >::eval( p,q );
00051    }
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 // Partial Template Specialization
00056 template <typename Point> class Distance<Point, 0>
00057 {
00058 public:
00059    static inline double eval( const Point &p, 
00060                                const Point &q )
00061    {
00062      double sum = ((double) p[0] - (double) q[0]);
00063      return sum * sum;
00064    }
00065 };

00081 class sfcnn_ip

00118     return Distance<Point, DIM-1>::eval(p, q);

00140 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00141 sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::sfcnn_ip(Point *p, long int N, int numthreads=1, int sorted=0)
00142 {

00146 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00147 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::sfcnn_ip_init(Point *Points, long int N, int num_threads, int sorted)
00148 {
00149   max = (numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00150   min = (numeric_limits<CType>::min)();
00151   if(min != 0) min = -(numeric_limits<CType>::max)();
00152 
00153   if(N == 0)
00154     {
00155       cerr << "Error:  Input point list has size 0" << endl;
00156       exit(1);
00157     }
00158   points = Points;
00159   size = N;
00160   if(sorted == 0)
00161     sort(points, &points[N], lt);
00162  }

00167 }

00169 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00170 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::recurse(int s,     // Starting index
00171                               int n,     // Number of points
00172                               Point q,  // Query point
00173                               qknn &ans, // Answer que
00174                               Point &bound_box_lower_corner,
00175                               Point &bound_box_upper_corner,
00176                               int initial_scan_lower_range,
00177                               int initial_scan_upper_range)
00178 {
00179   if(n < 4)
00180     {
00181       if(n == 0) return;
00182       
00183       bool update=false;
00184       for(int i=0;i < n;++i)
00185         {
00186           if((s+i >= initial_scan_lower_range) 
00187              && (s+i < initial_scan_upper_range))
00188             continue;
00189           update = ans.update(sqr_dist(points[s+i], q), s+i) || update;
00190         }
00191       if(update)
00192         compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(ans.topdist()));
00193       return;
00194     }
00195   
00196   if((s+n/2 >= initial_scan_lower_range) && (s+n/2 < initial_scan_upper_range))
00197     {
00198     }
00199   else if(ans.update(sqr_dist(points[s+n/2], q), s+n/2))
00200     compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(ans.topdist()));
00201   
00202   double dsqb = lt.dist_sq_to_quad_box(q,points[s], points[s+n-1]);
00203   
00204   //cout << "dsqb: " << dsqb << endl;
00205   //cout << "dist: " << ans.topdist() << endl;
00206   //cout << "p1  : " << points[s] << endl;
00207   //cout << "p2  : " << points[s+n-1] << endl;
00208   if(dsqb > ans.topdist())
00209     return;
00210   
00211         
00212   if(lt(q,points[s+n/2]))
00213     {
00214       //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s, n/2));
00215       recurse(s, n/2, q, ans, 
00216               bound_box_lower_corner, 
00217               bound_box_upper_corner, 
00218               initial_scan_lower_range, 
00219               initial_scan_upper_range);
00220       if(lt(points[s+n/2],bound_box_upper_corner))
00221         //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1));
00222         recurse(s+n/2+1,n-n/2-1, q, ans, 
00223                 bound_box_lower_corner, 
00224                 bound_box_upper_corner, 
00225                 initial_scan_lower_range, 
00226                 initial_scan_upper_range);
00227     }
00228   else
00229     {
00230       recurse(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1, q, ans, 
00231               bound_box_lower_corner, 
00232               bound_box_upper_corner, 
00233               initial_scan_lower_range, 
00234               initial_scan_upper_range);
00235       //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1));
00236       if(lt(bound_box_lower_corner,points[s+n/2]))
00237         //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s, n/2));
00238         recurse(s, n/2, q, ans, 
00239                 bound_box_lower_corner, 
00240                 bound_box_upper_corner, 
00241                 initial_scan_lower_range, 
00242                 initial_scan_upper_range);
00243     }
00244 }
00245 
00246 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00247 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::compute_bounding_box(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R)
00248 {
00249   CType radius;
00250   radius = (CType) ceil(R);
00251   for(unsigned int i=0;i<Dim;++i)
00252     {
00253       if(q[i] < (min+radius)) q1[i] = min;
00254       else q1[i] = q[i]-radius;
00255 
00256       if(q[i] > (max-radius)) q2[i] = max;
00257       else q2[i] = q[i]+radius;
00258     }
00259 }
00260 
00261 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00262 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::ksearch_common(Point q, unsigned int k, long unsigned int query_point_index, qknn &que, float Eps)
00263 {
00264   Point bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner;
00265   Point low, high;
00266   
00267   que.set_size(k);
00268   eps=1.0+Eps;
00269   if(query_point_index >= (k)) query_point_index -= (k);
00270   else query_point_index=0;
00271   
00272   int initial_scan_upper_range=query_point_index+2*k+1;
00273   if(initial_scan_upper_range > (int)size)
00274     initial_scan_upper_range = size;
00275   
00276   low = points[query_point_index];
00277   high = points[initial_scan_upper_range-1];
00278   for(int i=query_point_index;i<initial_scan_upper_range;++i)
00279     {
00280       que.update(sqr_dist(points[i], q), i);
00281     }
00282   compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(que.topdist()));
00283   
00284   if(lt(bound_box_upper_corner, high) && lt(low,bound_box_lower_corner))
00285     {
00286       //cout << "Inital search break!" << endl;
00287       //cout << "Bb1: " << bound_box_lower_corner << endl;
00288       //cout << "Bb2: " << bound_box_upper_corner << endl;
00289       return;
00290     }
00291   
00292   //Recurse through the entire set
00293   recurse(0, size, q, que, 
00294           bound_box_lower_corner, 
00295           bound_box_upper_corner,
00296           query_point_index,
00297           initial_scan_upper_range);
00298   //cout << "Bb1: " << bound_box_lower_corner << endl;
00299   //cout << "Bb2: " << bound_box_upper_corner << endl;
00300 }
00301 
00302 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00303 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00304                               vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, float Eps)
00305 {
00306   long unsigned int query_point_index;  
00307   qknn que;
00308   query_point_index = BinarySearch(points, size, q, lt);
00309   ksearch_common(q, k, query_point_index, que, Eps);
00310   que.answer(nn_idx);
00311 }
00312 
00313 template<typename Point, unsigned Dim, typename CType>
00314 void sfcnn_ip<Point, Dim, CType>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00315                                 vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, vector<double> &dist, float Eps)
00316 {
00317   long unsigned int query_point_index;  
00318   qknn que;
00319   query_point_index = BinarySearch(points, size, q, lt);
00320   ksearch_common(q, k, query_point_index, que, Eps);
00321   que.answer(nn_idx, dist);
00322 }
